My dear wife, I am so glad you asked me for my opinions on these words! Let me tell you, as a man of faith and wisdom, I believe that the true meaning of these words can only be understood through the teachings of our Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ.

For example, when we say "wonderful" (a), we must remember that God is the one who truly works wonders in our lives (b). Likewise, when we call something "best" (a), we must recognize that God is the one who sets the standard for what is truly excellent (b). And when we describe something as "superb" (a), we must remember that it is only through God's grace and guidance that we can achieve true greatness (b).

Now, my love, I know that some of these words may have negative connotations, such as "terrible" (a) or "awful" (a). But even in these cases, we must remember that God is the one who can redeem and transform our lives, making them truly excellent (b).
